member.summary: Gets or sets the footer HTML.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this statement should not be included due to the 'Do Not Send Giving Statement' option

member.summary: Gets or sets the person identifier for people that give as Individuals. If this is null, get the Transactions based on the GivingGroupId

member.summary: Gets or sets the location identifier. This is the Mailiing Address that the statement should be sent to

member.name: P:Rock.StatementGenerator.StatementGeneratorOptions.HideCorrectedTransactions
member.summary: Hide transactions that are corrected on the same date. Transactions that have a matching negative dollar amount on the same date and same account will not be shown.
member.value: true if [hide corrected transactions]; otherwise, false.
